pkgmetadata.longdescription: Harvest the Classification Tree // Aimed at applying the Harvest classification tree algorithm, which is a modified algorithm of classic classification tree. It was firstly used in drug discovery field, but it also performs well in other kind of data, especially when active region is unrelated.To learn more about the harvest classification algorithm, you can go to http://www.stat.ubc.ca/Research/TechReports/techreports/220.pdf for more information.
